channel.title: Need help with hosting my server!
channel.description: Ok guy please dont spam this just need some help ok first of all I did the no-ip and made a ip and I portforwarded 43594 and then I did all the stuff even enviromental valeaws and when I run my server I can log in but no one can when I try to post on moparscape server statues it says server is offline and all that please help me out :confused: thanks guys

item.title: Need help with hosting my server!
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Here are some simple steps.
1.) Throw your computer outside.
2.) Leave over night.
3.) Return the computer indoors.
4.) Leave MoparScape.
5.) Never come back.

Those simple steps will help you go on in life.
